commit message: Updated osmdroid jar to version 3.0.1 and added smoother animation when centering to gps location.
[issue #96] Manage a new storage path to save all track related files.
[issue #114] Cancel button in track details fixed. (Thanks to Paul O'Shea)

[issue #112, issue #108] Tracks can now be exported to the same directory. A user preference to handle the behavior was added. Spaces at the beginning and the end of export directory will be ignored during export.

[issue #59] Modified voice recording behavior. Voice recording can now be started during track logger view by either pressing DPAD_CENTER for 1 second or by pressing HEADSETHOOK. Voice recording can also be stopped by pressing DPAD_CENTER or HEADSETHOOK during a voice recording. Additionally voice recording duration preference has been extended to allow 10, 20 and 30 seconds of recording time.

[issue #115] Added preference to play some short beeps when voice recording starts and ends. This patch also includes some changes to reload the preferences for a voice recording when the dialog shows up.
[issue #117] Fixed wrong extra data trackId for INTENT_UPDATE_WP in TextNoteDialog.
[issue #111] Added preference to deactivate automatic screen rotation. Thanks to Paul O'Shea.
Added 'gen' folder to svn ignore (Generate resource classes)
[issue #140] Update PNG with optimized versions thanks to huebner.nils
[issue #139] Updated zoom PNG with full transparency thanks to huebner.nils
[issue #77] Track recording now starts immediately after starting a new track.
[issue #134] [issue #30] [issue #67] Bumping the SDK version to 1.6 at last

- Now requires Android 1.6.
- Voice recording can be started with dpad or headset button.
- Playing short beeps to indicate start and stop of a voice recording.
- Optimized PNGs icons file size.
- GPX export dramatic speed improvement.
- Track recording now starts immediately after starting a new Track.
- Updated translations: DE, SV.
